title: "PROMPT AI RAISES $5 MILLION IN SEED FUNDING TO REVOLUTIONIZE COMPUTER VISION"
excerpt: "SAN FRANCISCO, Sept. 28, 2023 /PRNewswire/ -- Prompt AI, a startup harnessing the power of large language models to democratize access to computer vision, raised $5 million in seed funding, led by prominent investors AIX Ventures and Abstract Ventures. The funding round also saw participation from several renowned angel investors."
